video.title: Chasing Life
video.synopsis: Adapted from a Mexican telenovela, this drama series about an ambitious young journalist takes a dark turn when she learns that she has cancer.

episodes.synopsis: When a diagnosis of cancer threatens to derail her dreams, promising young journalist April Carver chooses instead to chase life with renewed gusto.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: April takes on a big story about a politician and also learns she may have a half sister her own age. Meanwhile, Sara prods Brenna to get a job.
episodes.title: Help Wanted

episodes.synopsis: As April begins to question her relationship with Dominic, she begins an article on a carrot-juice maker who claims his product helps cancer patients.
episodes.title: Blood Cancer Sex Carrots

episodes.synopsis: April endures her first bone-marrow procedure, and Brenna makes an unexpected connection with a popular girl in her class.
episodes.title: I'll Sleep When I'm Dead

episodes.synopsis: April and Dominic share secrets from their past after they visit a psychic, and Brenna seeks advice about her romantic predicament.
episodes.title: The Family That Lies Together

episodes.synopsis: April lands a big interview with Leo's help, Brenna's love triangle begins to hit the skids, and Sara becomes a bit overprotective of her daughter.
episodes.title: Clear Minds, Full Lives, Can't Eat

episodes.synopsis: Before undergoing chemotherapy, April consults with a fertility doctor. Meanwhile, Dominic ponders accepting a new job that will take him on the road.
episodes.title: Unplanned Parenthood

episodes.synopsis: Leo and April help a friend face his impending death, Brenna bonds with Greer on a class trip, and Sara attends a support group.
episodes.title: Death Becomes Her

episodes.synopsis: Word about April's condition gets around her workplace as she prepares to begin chemotherapy, and Kieran discovers Brenna's relationship with Greer.
episodes.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting Chemo

episodes.synopsis: Just as April begins chemotherapy, Dominic breaks up with her. Meanwhile, Brenna and Greer's relationship also hits a speed bump.
episodes.title: Finding Chemo

episodes.synopsis: Leo proceeds with a risky surgery, April starts to lose her hair from chemotherapy, and Brenna wrestles with telling her grandparents that she's gay.
episodes.title: Locks of Love

episodes.synopsis: April's cancer goes into remission, but her return to work doesn't go smoothly. Meanwhile, Leo languishes in a coma.
episodes.title: Next April

episodes.synopsis: Brenna tries to persuade Natalie to go through a bone-marrow procedure to help April, and Leo harbors second thoughts about his surgery.
episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming to Donate

episodes.synopsis: Though she's still reeling from her breakup with Dominic, April begins a relationship with Leo, and George takes a new job in California.
episodes.title: Cancer Friends with Benefits

episodes.synopsis: Natalie causes turmoil in April's relationships with Dominic and Beth, and Brenna turns to a friend after she's bullied at school.
episodes.title: April Just Wants to Have Fun

episodes.synopsis: April faces a tough choice when she lands an interview with a famous baseball player, and Brenna becomes worried about Greer's unusual behavior.
episodes.title: The Big Leagues

episodes.synopsis: Fallout from her interview with a baseball hero sinks April in controversy, and Brenna and Greer agree to participate in a fashion show.
episodes.title: Model Behavior

episodes.synopsis: A nosebleed sends April into a panic that her cancer has returned, and Sara frets over Natalie's negative influence on Brenna.
episodes.title: Rest in Peace

episodes.synopsis: Leo decides to stop attending his support group, Beth has mixed feelings about moving in with Graham, and Greer stands up to her parents.
episodes.title: Life, Actually

episodes.synopsis: April confronts her feelings about Dominic and Natalie's tryst, Sara goes to visit George, and Brenna helps Greer through her parents' divorce.
episodes.title: No News Is Bad News

episodes.synopsis: Brenna learns she's a bone marrow match for a fellow student, and April's cancer returns -- just as Leo proposes marriage.
episodes.title: One Day

episodes.synopsis: A month after Leo's proposal, April looks for a new job while planning their engagement party. Natalie questions Dominic's feelings for April.
episodes.title: A View from the Ledge

episodes.synopsis: While April and Beth take a spontaneous trip to Bermuda, Sara weighs whether she can afford both Brenna's private school and April's treatment.
episodes.title: The Age of Consent

episodes.synopsis: With the family's attention focused on April, Brenna feels neglected and bonds with Natalie. Meanwhile, April shops for a wedding dress.
episodes.title: Life of Brenna

episodes.synopsis: After Natalie shows April their father's unpublished novel, April decides to investigate whether it holds any clues about their family's past.
episodes.title: Truly Madly Deeply

episodes.synopsis: April and her girlfriends cut loose at her bachelorette party, while Dominic and Leo's friend Frankie takes Leo to check out a band for the wedding.
episodes.title: The Domino Effect

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of their wedding, April fears that Leo is marrying her out of pity, and the couple butts heads over April's friendship with Dominic.
episodes.title: That Last W

episodes.synopsis: April and Leo try their hand at married life and discover that they don't see eye to eye when it comes to having children.
episodes.title: As Long As We Both Shall Live

episodes.synopsis: Overcome with grief, April shuts down and isolates herself, until she finds a letter that leads her and Beth on a scavenger hunt.
episodes.title: The Ghost in You

episodes.synopsis: After receiving her inheritance, April uses her new financial security to do anything and everything she can do to feel good again.
episodes.title: Wild Thing

episodes.synopsis: With everyone snowed in by a storm at the Carver house, April and Natalie question George, trying to find out the truth about their father.
episodes.title: A Bottle of Secrets

episodes.synopsis: April meets with a literary agent and prepares her opening remarks for a ribbon-cutting ceremony at a summer camp dedicated to Leo.
episodes.title: First Person

episodes.synopsis: April uses her connections at the Post to schmooze with a book publisher at an exclusive event, but is out-scooped by a former college friend.
episodes.title: Ready or Not

episodes.synopsis: April and Beth prepare for their trip to Rome. Greer announces that she's returning to Boston, making Brenna both excited and conflicted about Finn.
episodes.title: La Dolce Vida
